name: The Official AngerMGMT Podcast T-Shirt!
description: GET ANGRY! Introducing the first official shirt for the AngerMGMT Podcast with Jay Weber. Now you can wear your anger on your sleeve...or at least on your chest. Made from 100% ringspun cotton, the shirt is preshrunk, for your pleasure. Perfect for men, women, and slightly larger children, this t-shirt will certainly catch some stares and may alert the authorities. Note: This is part of a special preorder sale. Customers making purchases before October 1 should expect an added two weeks time before receiving their order. Thank you for your patience. Additional note: T-shirt design is an approximation. The final design may change slightly from the image above, although we do not anticipate this being a reality.

name: The Official Talking Nerdy Podcast T-shirt! (Black)
description: GOT NERD? Introducing the first official shirt for the Talking Nerdy podcast with renowned songwriter Walt Lafty and journalist Ari Halbkram. Now you can proudly proclaim to the world that you're a nerd! Made from 100% ringspun cotton, the shirt is preshrunk, for your pleasure. Perfect for men, women, and slightly larger children, this t-shirt is bound to cause fellow nerds and geeks to squee in delight, while the jocks and cheerleaders continue to ignore you. Actually, these shirts are so stylish, they may just notice you anyway. Note: T-shirt design is an approximation. The final design may change slightly from the image above, although we do not anticipate this being a reality.
